title: Faith: The Key To Success: Unlock the Door to a Fuller Life!
features: Why another book about faith? We're glad you asked. Although much has been written and preached on the subject of faith, misunderstanding abounds when it comes to appropriating the blessings God has for his people. At one extreme are those sincere Christians who take a fatalistic approach, passively waiting to "see what God will do" on their behalf. At the other extreme are equally sincere believers who agressively "name and claim" the blessings they feel are rightfullt theirs.

If you find yourself near either of these extremes, what youa re about to read will re-write your understanding of the faith life. If you are somewhere in between, you will find your faith enriched and strengthened.
description: Henry Fernandez is the founder and Presiding Bishop of the FAith Center in Fort Lauderdale, FL. In addition to pastoring a growing local ministry, Bishop Fenrandez oversees churches in Arizona and Jamaica. He is also a pastor to many other pastors in a network of churches he has established. He draws on his background in the corporate arena to teach seminars on debt-free, abundant living and has used his entrepreneurial skills to help establish several businesses that benefit the local community. He is a sought-after speaker who appears on INSP and TBN, and his TV program reaches 650 million home world-wide. He has authored another book, Divine Love and holds and honorary Doctorate from the University of Fort Lauderdale. Henryand his wife Dr. Carole Fernandez minister side by side to the glory of God.
